title: Pokey LaFarge Mines His Midwestern Roots, Finds 'Something In The Water'
teaser: The singer-songwriter brings his acoustic guitar to the Fresh Air studio to sing some new songs as well as some of his favorites from the 1920s and '30s. Originally broadcast April 27, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
